oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: All Star Western Theatre - 1946-mm-dd (Dale Evans guests) - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of All Star Western Theatre radio program. Broadcast date unknown, likely broadcast between August and December of 1946 (unconfirmed). CMF collection is missing programs for August 25, December 8, and December 29 of 1946; as this disc is backed with another undated show, the December dates are likely possibilities (unconfirmed). This disc was possibly recorded October 2, 1946 (unconfirmed). Featuring Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage, with announcer Cottonseed Clark, and guest Dale Evans.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Foy Willing; Riders Of The Purple Sage; Dale Evans
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme (Drifting Along, Singing A Song) -- Opening statement (Cottonseed Clark) -- Sing Me A Song Of The Prairie (Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage) -- Drifting Along, Singing A Song (instrumental) -- Cottonseed Clark introduces the Riders Of The Purple Sage -- Little Coquette (Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage) -- Cottonseed Clark introduces Dale Evans -- Radio play (Dale Evans, cast) [continued in part 2]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: All star western theatre (Radio program); Clark, Cottonseed; Willing, Foy, 1914-1978; Riders of the Purple Sage; Sloey, Al; Rogers, Dale Evans
